name: InTime Biotech LLC, Delaware, USA
slogan: Real Time Online AI Health (diseases/viruses) Tracker, prolonging life on 20+ years
description:
Longevity InTime BioTech (Delaware, USA) develops the real time technology of an online early stages diseases diagnosis by measuring human biodata online. With a hardware, software & a complex of devices we predict & prevent the severe diseases on the not known before earliest stages, which can affect the longevity. The company's objective is in predicting & preventing severe diseases by instant distant real time monitoring of 400+ essential health parameters. With participatory of our users we give insights on their health & with AI server, trained on the 50+ years of G20 Big Data, we make personal recommendations how to avoid the upcoming diseases & to extend their own lifespan.

We are the global early-stage company with a great team of experienced bioinformaticians, award winning scientists & top managers with startup experience, solving the global problem of longevity. Our diverse 25 IT Developers team from 5 countries have formed, possibly, the world’s biggest biotech startup, in which all team members devoted to humanity's longevity contribute their working capital 24/7 on the option stock basis.

Our ultimate goal is to make people live 20+ active & happy years without limitations. We bring personal & national interest solution to each nation & region.On our way to fight TOP 20 severe diseases we have started with fighting obesity ... & added urgently the coronavirus in our list. Applications AntiObesity & AntiCoronaVirus are coming in April in mobile stores. We believe that our clients want to see how their kids will raise their own grandchildren! We plan to deliver this product InTime! Because of COVID-19, almost all the world, first time ever united in fighting early death, we have started this fight in 2018 and welcome everyone to join us on the stock option basis, who is not indifferent to prolonging active & healthy life.

team.name: Oleg Teterin
team.bioHtml:
InTime BioTech LLC, Founder
Producer Chef (R.Downey Jr).
Personal Ad Sales 100M$
$1,6B Net Worth Investment Banker Advisor 
Patent holder on smiley ";-)"

jobs.title: Back-End Python Django Senior Developer, Software Engineer, AI, ML, CTO
jobs.description:
Hi. Perhaps with self-isolation and remote work you have a little more time, part of which you can devote to something more than just work.

InTime Biotech LLC (Delaware, USA) is associated with the interaction of technology with humans, "we help the code to help people"! We will be glad if you help us to launch AntiCoronaVirus online tracker based on our MVP 1.0 (AntiObesity) in 2-3 weeks and help the current team not to delay launching MVP with version 2.0, which will fight Stroke & Heart attack.

We continue to assemble an international team and recently released the first version of MVP, according to the brief description of the product (in the link below). The terms indicated in the brief are given for guidance and may vary depending on the competencies recruited by new team members. We can be useful to each other if you are satisfied with our form of payment - a share in the authorized capital of our company for part-time work in your free time.

A couple of publications that have recently been published about our company in Russian media, (since we have chosen as the test region Russia, due to our original location) on RBC TV, Kommersant newspaper and Evening Moscow TV:

Kommersant: https://www.kommersant.ru/doc/4300795 
(in English: https://yadi.sk/d/QvnkIsstikieNw )

RBC: https://yadi.sk/i/oUIjjehXTxZ4pw

Evening Moscow TV: https://vm.ru/news/788392-futurolog-nazval-datu-kogda-chelovechestvo-obretet-bessmertie
https://vm.ru/tv/789261-skvoznoj-efir-26-marta-chast-3 (from 44 min. 30 sec.)
https://vm.ru/tv/786325-ekspert-oleg-teterin-chto-budet-esli-chelovek-budet-zhit-do-150-let

You can use online translators to have an English version of these publications.

It’s hard to understand right away how good anyone is, but I think that if we agree on the conditions of work for a shares, then this is a mutual compromise and we make steps towards each other, and the first step is, essentially, made by you and when the time comes, if suddenly something goes wrong on your part (everything can be), we will also make the step towards you. In other words, without trying, you will never understand. 

We want to build something special with small steps, which we can be proud of. We believe that we can, by making an online tracker, catch diseases at the stages where no one has caught them yet and give recommendations on how to avoid these diseases. Scientists have proven that any disease can be avoided by catching it long before the time of the disease. We believe that in doing so we will increase life by an average of 20 years. 

Pitch Deck:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1P7Jj2lxN0BTt2pDR1t1Z1owmee3tUyNk/view?usp=sharing

Future Longevity Vision:
https://yadi.sk/i/R7clfDptyYCyLA

More details in the attached file from my speech at the Moscow State University at the Biotechnology Faculty: https://yadi.sk/d/AAjG8zflGIHqyw

Our slogan, which lays down in the goal and mission of our company: “let's see how our children will raise their grandchildren” (not our grandchildren, but their ... how many years is this, have you calculated?))

I suggest starting:
1. We discuss the volume of your work in relation to the brief, which is more "wishes to the final product", based on your competence.

2. We evaluate in money and what will be the result we fix in an agreement where it will be clearly written that if the output is what you agreed on and +/- meet the deadlines, then your share is yours, if there are significant deviations from the results and deadlines ( we will write in the contract), then the share either does not transfer or is much smaller, but with the right to return to the original size, if you correct the situation or bring something significant to the company (speed up the next stage of development, etc.). Our team believes that this scheme of work is not free, but rather paid at times more than the current real cost of your costs, because by the time of the sale of part of the share, the share will increase.

Why is our company considered less risky than another - because we are in a biotechnological trend, in the trend of distance medicine and in the trend of the market of goods and services aimed at prolonging an active life of a person. How many such companies do you know?

3. We convert this to a fraction based on the assumption that the company is now worth $ 29.4 million. The assessment is determined by the progress of the company on the current date, the assessment of external consultants and potential investors, transactions with the current team of 25 IT developers, 7 shareholders, 10 experts and, of course, the inherent potential. We are the first startup in the world with so many like-minded people working for the end result without traditional salaries in the field of biotechnology. The whole team believes in what we are building, so it invests its time and part of its life in a product created by our own hands. Team, experts are from 7 countries and speak 6 languages.

4. We discuss the following amount of work on the terms of 1-2 points of this letter, convert it from the current (at the time of discussing the new scope of tasks) company valuation

5. At any stage, when real cash enters the company, we can switch from payment in the form of a share to the cash, while retaining the earned share, which you will agree to capitalize, developing our joint company already. We can also stipulate the terms for the purchase of your share from you after the investment has entered.

If the approach suits you, I’m waiting for an answer from you on 1-2 points sent to teterin@intime.digital

Please carefully read the documents in the links, this is more our vision. If we go further, then with those documents that will follow, including the contract. 
How much carefully you read it will show how accurate you are in your professional field, because the development does not tolerate a superficial attitude, as well as our health, on which, no matter how trivial, the term of our life depends!

We already have a development team with these competencies, but we want to strengthen it: mobile and backend developers with a must: Django 2+ years, Django REST framework, Python 3.7, PostgreSQL, MySQL, RabbitMQ, Nginx. Would be a plus: Gunicorn, Vue/React JS, GCP Pub/Sub, GCP Compute Engine, GCP Functions

Also need help with the design and development of UI / UX design. We are looking for team leads. iOS development team we want to add specialists with the knowledge of Swift, RxSwift, MVC/MVVM, AutoLayout+IB, Codable to correct / upgrade UI, to write modules in RIBs architecture, work with data modules coing from backend Moya -> Codable -> CollectionView/TableView

The back office needs technical and business analysts, marketing managers, SMM specialists, sales, lawyers - in general, we are completing the formation of the team in the next week, we are considering candidates who are ready to study if we have not yet managed to get used to something.

We pay special attention to the development of Data Science, Big Data, ML, AI, Data Mining, Computer Vision, and the applicants with knowledge in the fields of medicine, biology, chemistry and physics. We are looking for specialists in hardware (wearable electronics) and RDT (rapid diagnostic testing), using the example of such a device https://atomodiagnostics.com (created by the Australian government).

Our stage today: PoC (proof of concept), finished MVP AntiObesity (14 parameters), development of AntiCoronaVirus (14 parameters)

Our nearest development plan, which will be completed soon:
1) Custom Usermodel; 2) Pages for website (incl. Dashboard, Login / Logout, Register) 3) CMS / Admin panel. 4) DataBase for health parameters. 5) Creating MVP for obesity 6)
The development of an algorithm that creates a private forecast of the life span of a specific person based on an array of data (marked up information) according to the dependence of certain diseases on specific parameter indicators (analyzes and other bio-dates) of a particular person. 7) Creating MVP AntiCoronaVirus.

I will wait for an answer and comments to teterin@intime.digital.

Thanks.

-
Teterin Oleg

Founder, CEO
Longevity InTime BioTech

+79852287192
+17187104509

To book a whatsapp call, please follow this link: https://calendly.com/teterinoleg/15min

jobs.title: Graphic Designer
jobs.description:
As a Graphic Designer you will be working with different departments to conceptualize, design and deliver A+ creatives and animation for online and offline audiences (website, application graphics, flyers, social media content, etc).
- 2+ years of experience in core graphic design and animation for an internet product (preferably mobile first)
- Exceptionally good visual designer with strong typographic, composition, animation and video editing skills.
- Command over leading design software, e.g., Sketch, Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects etc.
- Should be a keen self learner and willing to learn the new advancements in the field of visual design
About out company:
Real time early stage diseases online diagnosis through wearable gadgets & portable Rapid Diagnostic Tests (RDP) tracks the upcoming disease intime & gives insights on how to avoid disease in the future.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
As a Graphic Designer you will be working with different departments to conceptualize, design and deliver A+ creatives and animation for online and offline audiences (website, application graphics, flyers, social media content, etc).

  • 2+ years of experience in core graphic design and animation for an internet product (preferably mobile first)
  • Exceptionally good visual designer with strong typographic, composition, animation and video editing skills.
  • Command over leading design software, e.g., Sketch, Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects etc.
  • Should be a keen self learner and willing to learn the new advancements in the field of visual design About out company: Real time early stage diseases online diagnosis through wearable gadgets & portable Rapid Diagnostic Tests (RDP) tracks the upcoming disease intime & gives insights on how to avoid disease in the future.

jobs.title: IP Lawyer, Intellectual Property Attorney
jobs.description:
InTime Biotech - making an AI Online Health Tracker which prolongs life. We are choosing an IP lawyer, who cansecure our 5 IP objects in G-20 countries:

1. Algorithm
2. Method
3. Utility model
4. Brand
5. Program codes

Here are the documents on the company & the product:

Pitch Deck:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1P7Jj2lxN0BTt2pDR1t1Z1owmee3tUyNk/view?usp=sharing

Product Description:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/123rFkM1n5R0MgRkBtDJUeeJJkNTQcnkm/view?usp=sharing

We can offer only shares for your time.

It's the real time technology of an online early stages diseases diagnosis by measuring human biodata online. With a hardware, software & a complex of devices we predict & prevent the severe diseases on the not known before earliest stages, which can affect the longevity.  The company's objective is in predicting & preventing severe diseases by instant distant real time monitoring of 400+ essential health parameters. With participatory of our users we give insights on their health & with AI server, trained on the 50+ years of G20 Big Data, we make personal recommendations how to avoid the upcoming diseases & to extend their own lifespan. We are the global early-stage company with a great team of experienced bioinformaticians, award winning scientists, IT developers & top managers with startup experience, solving the global problem of longevity.

Our diverse 25 IT Developers team from 5 countries have formed, possibly, the world’s biggest biotech startup, in which all team members devoted to humanity's longevity contribute their working capital 24/7 on the option stock basis.

Our ultimate goal is to make people live 20+ active & happy years without limitations. We bring personal & national interest solution to each nation & region.On our way to fight TOP 20 severe diseases we have started with fighting obesity ... & added urgently the coronavirus in our list. Applications AntiObesity & AntiCoronaVirus are coming in April in mobile stores. We believe that our clients want to see how their kids will raise their own grandchildren! We plan to deliver this product InTime! Because of COVID-19, almost all the world, first time ever united in fighting early death, we have started this fight in 2018 and welcome more developers to join us on the stock option basis, who is not indifferent to prolonging active & healthy life. More about cofounders options here: https://yadi.sk/d/w7s8MjiAeDfHPQ or you can email me teterin@intime.digital
